SA15jithetuu:5: 2. vādinā svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭo 'rthaḥ sādhyaḥ / yena sādhyate tatsādhanam //
SA15jithetuu:10: vipakṣe ca asattvameva niścitamiti tṛtīyaṃ rūpam //
SA15jithetuu:11: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddhaviśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitumiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:12: yathā dharmī śabdo 'nitya iti viśeṣaṇena viśiṣṭaḥ sādhyaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:14: 5. kaḥ punaḥ sapakṣaḥ / sādhyadharmasāmānyena samānaḥ sapakṣaḥ / yathā ghaṭādiriti //
SA15jithetuu:15: 6. ko hetorvipakṣaḥ / yatra sādhyābhāvāddhetvabhāvo niścayena pradarśyate / yathākāśādiḥ //
SA15jithetuu:21: 8. sa punardvividho dṛśyate / sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa ca //
SA15jithetuu:26: 10. vaidharmyeṇāpyanityatvābhāve kṛtakatvābhāvaḥ / yathākāśādiḥ / śabdastu kṛtaka iti //
SA15jithetuu:27: 11. kaḥ punaḥ pakṣābhāsaḥ / pakṣābhāso vastuto na pakṣaḥ / pratyakṣādivirodhādayaṃ pakṣābhāsaḥ //
SA15jithetuu:28: 12. yathā dhūmādirdharmī buddhimaddhetūtpannaḥ sādhya iti pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ pakṣābhāsaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:31: vedavacanaṃ dharmyapauruṣeyamiti sādhye śabdaḥ prayatnānantarīyaka iti pauruṣeyatvasya siddheḥ //
SA15jithetuu:35: 15. lokaviruddho yathā / śuci naraśiraḥ kapālaṃ prāṇyaṅgatvāc chaṅkhaśuktivaditi //
SA15jithetuu:39: 17. aprasiddhaviśeṣaṇo yathā / vaiśeṣikasya sāṃkhyaṃ prati śabdo vināśīti //
SA15jithetuu:40: 18. aprasiddhaviśeṣyo yathā / sāṃkhyasya bauddhaṃ pratyātmā cetana iti sādhyam //
SA15jithetuu:42: vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇamātmeti kāyaḥ sthirasvabhāva iti vā //
SA15jithetuu:44: 21. kīdṛśo hetvābhāsaḥ / yo heturivābhāsate na tu hetutvena sidhyati //
SA15jithetuu:47: 24. pakṣe sapakṣe cāsan vipakṣe ca san yaḥ sa viruddha iti hetvābhāsaḥ sādhyaviparītasiddheḥ //
SA15jithetuu:48: 25. sapakṣavipakṣayorubhayorbhāve 'bhāve vā saṃśaye vāsiddhapratibandho yo hetuḥ so 'naikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:50: 26. ubhayāsiddho yathā / śabdasyānityatve sādhye hetuścākṣuṣatvaṃ vādiprativādinorasiddha iti //
SA15jithetuu:51: 27. cetanastaruriti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇāditi hetuḥ prativādinaṃ bauddhaṃ pratyasiddha iti prativādyasiddhaścittādinirodhasya bauddhasyeṣṭatvāt //
SA15jithetuu:52: 28. acetanāḥ sukhādaya iti sādhye utpattimattvāditi hetuḥ sāṃkhyasya svayaṃ vādino 'siddha iti vādyasiddhaḥ //
SA15jithetuu:53: 29. vaiśeṣikeṇa prativādinaṃ bauddhaṃ prati pṛthivyādirdharmī kārya iti sādhya ekaikakṣaṇavadanyānyotpādāditi vādinaḥ svayamasiddhaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:56: cetanāstaravaḥ svāpāditi hetuścandane vādinaḥ svayaṃ pakṣaikadeśe 'siddhaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:57: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṃkocabhājaḥ //
SA15jithetuu:58: 31. evameva kṣityādirgharmī buddhimajjāta iti sādhye kāryamiti heturbauddhaṃ pratyasiddhaḥ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇasambandhasiddhasvarūpeṇa kṣityādīnāṃ siddheḥ /
SA15jithetuu:60: 32. saṃdigdhāsiddho yathā / yadīha dhūmaḥ syādatra vahniḥ syāditi sādhye hetvaniścayāt //
SA15jithetuu:62: eṣvanekeṣu nikuñjeṣu kasmiṃścin nikuñje mayūra iti sādhye kekāyitāditi heturiti //
SA15jithetuu:67: 37. yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sarvatra varttamānaḥ sādhāraṇo 'naikāntika iti //
SA15jithetuu:68: 38. evaṃ śabdo nitya iti sādhye śrāvaṇatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣe vipakṣe cāvṛtterasādhāraṇo 'naikāntikaḥ //
SA15jithetuu:69: 39. evaṃ śabdasyāprayatnānantarīyakatve sādhye 'nityatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣaikadeśavṛtti rvipakṣavyāpyanaikāntikaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:75: 40. evaṃ śabdasya prayatnānantīyakatve sādhye 'nityatvāditi hetu rghaṭādau sarvatra vidyate /
SA15jithetuu:80: dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhye 'mūrttatvāditi hetuḥ /
SA15jithetuu:82: tatra sapakṣaikadeśa ākāśe 'mūrttatvaṃ vidyate na paramāṇau paramāṇūnāṃ mūrttatvāt /
SA15jithetuu:86: kapilādi rdharmyasarvajña iti sādhye vaktṛtvāditi hetū rathyāpuruṣādau sapakṣe vidyate vipakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:89: ṛṣabhavardhamānādi rdharmī sarvajña iti sādhye kevalaśāstrakarttṛtvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:94: jīvaccharīrasambandhī prāṇādiḥ sātmake nirātmake vā varttamāno vyāvṛtto vetyaniścayaḥ //
SA15jithetuu:98: dṛṣṭāntābhāvādanvayasyāniścayo vyatirekasya ca niścaya ityayaṃ saṃdigdho hetuḥ //
SA15jithetuu:101: 49. yathā dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhyadharmaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:102: kṛtakatvādākāśādivadityayaṃ heturghaṭādau vipakṣa eva vidyate na sapakṣe //
SA15jithetuu:103: 50. evaṃ dharmī śabdo nitya iti sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvāditi hetuḥ sapakṣa ākāśādau nāsti ghaṭādāvekadeśe 'sti vidyudādau nāstīti /
SA15jithetuu:106: ete cakṣurādayaḥ parārthā iti sādhyadharmaḥ saṃghātatvāditi hetuḥ śayanāsanādivaditi sapakṣanirdeśaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:107: ayaṃ heturyathā cakṣurādeḥ pārārthyaṃ sādhayati tathā saṃhatatvamapi parasya sādhayati /
SA15jithetuu:110: dharmyādirbuddhimataḥ kāraṇādutpadyata iti sādhye sāśratvāditi hetuḥ /
SA15jithetuu:112: yathānena hetunā buddhimaddhetuto jātatvaṃ sādhyate tathā buddhimatkarttuḥ sāśrayatvamapi sādhyate //
SA15jithetuu:114: vaiśeṣikeṇa yogācāraṃ prati dharmyātmā cetanā iti sādhye vijñānādhiṣṭhānāditi hetu ryathācetanamātmānaṃ cetanaṃ sādhayati tathāyaṃ heturanityamapi sādhayati vijñānasyānityatvāt //
SA15jithetuu:116: 55. viruddhāvyabhicārī kutrāpi hetudoṣo na bhavatīti tasyodāharaṇopanyāso na yuktaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:122: yadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ sadyatra nopalabhyate na tat tatra asti /
SA15jithetuu:127: sapakṣādanyo dṛṣṭānto na kaścidastīti sapakṣa evāyaṃ sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭānto bhavati /
SA15jithetuu:138: maraṇadharmā puruṣa iti sādhye rāgādimattvāditi hetū rathyāpuruṣadṛṣṭānte saṃdigdhaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:141: dharmī kaścit puruṣaḥ asarvajña iti sādhye rāgādimattvāditi hetuḥ /
SA15jithetuu:155: sādhyena sādhanasya vyāptirdarśanīyā sādhanena tu sādhyasya vyāptirdarśitā /
SA15jithetuu:161: iha paramāṇurvaidharmyadṛṣṭānta iti sādhanadharmo 'mūrttatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ mūrttatvātparamāṇunām /
SA15jithetuu:165: iha sādhyadharmo nityatvaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ karmaṇo 'nityatvāt sādhanadharmo na vyāvṛtto 'mūrttatvātkarmaṇaḥ //
SA15jithetuu:168: atrākāśādervaidharmyadṛṣṭāntāt sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca na vyāvṛttam //
SA15jithetuu:175: iha vaidharmyodāharaṇa ukta ṛṣabhavardhamānāderasarvajñatvaṃ vyāvṛttamavyāvṛttaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ //
SA15jithetuu:177: iha trayīvidā brāhmaṇena kapilakaṇādādiḥ puruṣo na grāhyavacano rāgādimattvāditi /
SA15jithetuu:178: atra vaidharmyodāharaṇamucyate yo grāhyavacano na sa rāgādimān yathā gotamādayaḥ dharmaśāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti /
SA15jithetuu:183: yo vītarāgaḥ sa na parigrahāgrahavān yathā ṛṣabhavarddhemānādiriti /
SA15jithetuu:184: ṛṣabhādeḥ vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntād vītarāgatvaparigrahāgrahayoḥ sādhyasādhanadharmayorvyatireko 'vyatireko veti saṃdehaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:191: yatrāvītarāgatvaṃ nāsti na sa vaktā yathopalakhaṇḍa iti /
SA15jithetuu:192: yadyapīdamupalakhaṇḍādvyāvṛttaṃ tathāpi sarvasmādvītarāgādvaktṛtvaṃ na vyāvṛttaṃ sandehāt //
SA15jithetuu:197: evaṃ yannityaṃ tatsarvaṃ niyatamakṛtakaṃ dṛśyate yathākāśādiriti vāgvibhāgo vaktrā karttavyaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:208: yadā pūrvapakṣavādino 'bhūtaṃ doṣamudbhāvayati tadā sa dūṣaṇābhāso jātiriti /
SA15jithetuu:210: yathā pakṣadoṣābhāve pakṣadoṣodbhāvanaṃ hetudoṣābhāve hetudoṣodbhāvanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadoṣābhāve ca dṛṣṭāntadoṣodbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇābhāsa iti //
SA15jithetuu:212: pratijñā hetuḥ udāharaṇam upanayaḥ nigamanaṃ ceti pañcāvayavaṃ sādhanamiti /
SA15jithetuu:215: yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādirityudāharaṇam /
SA15jithetuu:222: yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiriti dṛṣṭānte sādhyasādhanayorvyāptipratipādanamanvaya ityucyate //
SA15jithetuu:225: 87. śabdo 'pi kṛtaka iti pakṣadharma ucyate / pratijñā nigamanaṃ ca sarvathā na vaktavye //
SA15jithetuu:227: yathā yatkṛtakaṃ sarvaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā ghaṭādiḥ śabdo 'pi kṛtaka iti sādharmyaprayogaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:230: yannityaṃ tadakṛtakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathākāśādiḥ śabdastu kṛtaka iti vaidharmyaprayogaḥ //
SA15jithetuu:236: atyādayaḥ krāntādyarthe dvitīyayeti samāsenābhidheyaliṅgaḥ pratyakṣaśabdaḥ siddhaḥ /
SA15jithetuu:237: pratyakṣo 'vabodhaḥ pratyakṣā buddhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ jñānaṃ ceti yuktaṃ bhavati //
SA15jithetuu:238: 91. cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ nāsikā jihvā kāyaśceti pañcendriyāṇi /
SA15jithetuu:239: tadāśritasya jñānasya pañca grāhyaviṣayā rūpaṃ śabdo gandho rasaḥ spraṣṭavyañceti pañcaiva prameyāṇi //
SA15jithetuu:240: 92. tacca pratyakṣaṃ nāmajātyādikalpanāpoḍhaṃ nirvikalpaṃ vā yadi punarabhrāntaṃ pramāṇamucyate pradarśitārthe 'visaṃvādāt /
SA15jithetuu:247: ayaṃ sthāṇurvā puruṣo veti jñānaṃ ca /
SA15jithetuu:250: vyāvahārikamindriyajñānaṃ sarvacittacaittānāmātmasaṃvedanaṃ svasaṃvedanaṃ bhūtārthabhāvanāsphuṭaprakarṣaparyantajaṃ yogijñānaṃ ceti //
SA15jithetuu:251: 95. tasya viṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇam / arthakriyāsamarthaṃ svalakṣaṇam / na sāmānyamarthakriyāsamartham /
SA15jithetuu:255: 98. tatra svārthaṃ tāvat pakṣadharmagrahaṇāt sādhyasādhanasambandhasmṛteḥ paścāt pratipatturarthasya yathāvadyā pratītistadeva svārthānumānam //
SA15jithetuu:258: yathā yatna dhūmaḥ tatra agniryathā mahānasādau /
SA15jithetuu:260: agnyabhāve dhūmābhāvo yathā sajale deśa iti atra tu dhūmāditi //
SA15jithetuu:264: iha punastena vyāpakena rūpeṇa vyāpyo hetuḥ //
SA15jithetuu:271: hetuphalasambandhe vyāpyavyāpakasambandhe ca siddhe sādhyasādhanasambandho bhavati nānyathā visaṃvādakatvāt //
SA15jithetuu:276: 107. imāni phalāni pakvānyekaśākhāto jātatvādbhuktaphalavadityatra prāyeṇaivaṃ dṛṣṭe 'pi sādhyasādhanayorvisaṃvāda eva //
SA15jithetuu:277: 108. yatpārthivaṃ tatsarvaṃ lohalekhyaṃ dṛśyate yathā vṛkṣādaya iti / atra vajro 'pi pārthivaḥ //
SA15jithetuu:278: 109. ye prāṇinaste sarve sakandharā yathoṣṭrādaya iti / atra kulīro 'pi prāṇī //
SA15jithetuu:279: 110. yaddravadravyaṃ tadārdraṃ dṛśyate yathā jalamiti / atra raso 'pi dravadravyam //
SA15jithetuu:282: bhāratīyopādhyāyena paṇḍitena kumārakalasena bhāṣāntarakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā śākyaprabheṇa ca bhoṭabhāṣāyāṃ vipariṇamayya saṃśodhya ca vinyastaḥ //
